recipes.name: Caramel Strawberry Milkshake
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken breast, crisp romaine lettuce, and homemade croutons.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 2 chicken breasts, grilled and sliced

  • 1 head romaine lettuce, chopped

  • 1 cup croutons

  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese

  • 1/4 cup Caesar dressing
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Grill the chicken breasts until cooked through, then slice them thinly.

  • 2

    In a large bowl, toss the chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing until well coated.

  • 3

    Divide the dressed lettuce among serving plates.

  • 4

    Top each plate with grilled chicken slices, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.

  • 5

    Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipes.nutrition:

recipes.name: Cashew Vegan Rice
recipes.description: A flavorful stir-fry loaded with colorful vegetables and tofu, served over steamed rice.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 block firm tofu, pressed and cubed

  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 1 tablespoon ginger, grated

  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce

  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil

  • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

  • Cooked rice, for serving
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.

  • 2

    Add garlic and ginger to the skillet, and sauté until fragrant.

  • 3

    Add cubed tofu to the skillet and cook until golden brown on all sides.

  • 4

    Add mixed vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.

  • 5

    Pour soy sauce and sesame oil over the tofu and vegetables, and toss to coat evenly.

  • 6

    Serve the vegetable stir-fry over cooked rice and enjoy!
recipes.nutrition:
Nutrition Facts

recipes.name: Smoked Salmon Salad Sandwich
recipes.description: A delightful sandwich featuring ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 2 slices sandwich bread

  • 1 large tomato, sliced

  • 4 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced

  • Fresh basil leaves

  • Balsamic glaze

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Toast the sandwich bread until golden brown.

  • 2

    Layer tomato slices, mozzarella slices, and fresh basil leaves on one slice of toasted bread.

  • 3

    Drizzle balsamic glaze over the sandwich filling, then season with salt and pepper to taste.

  • 4

    Top with the remaining slice of toasted bread.

  • 5

    Slice the sandwich in half and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Salmon in Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: A nutritious salad featuring protein-rich quinoa, creamy avocado, and fiber-packed black beans, tossed in a tangy lime vinaigrette.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup quinoa, cooked

  • 1 avocado, diced

  • 1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed

  • 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

  • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped

  • 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped

  • Juice of 1 lime

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, diced avocado, black beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and chopped cilantro.

  • 2

    In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.

  • 3

    Pour the dressing over the quinoa salad and toss gently to combine.

  • 4

    Adjust seasoning if necessary, then serve and enjoy!

recipes.name: Healthy Jam Waffle Breakfast
recipes.description: A satisfying wrap filled with lean turkey, creamy avocado, crisp lettuce, and tangy mustard, all wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 whole wheat tortilla

  • 3 slices turkey breast

  • 1/2 avocado, sliced

  • 1/4 cup shredded lettuce

  • 1 tablespoon mustard
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Lay the whole wheat tortilla flat on a clean surface.

  • 2

    Layer turkey slices, avocado slices, and shredded lettuce on the tortilla.

  • 3

    Spread mustard over the filling ingredient.

  • 4

    Fold the sides of the tortilla inward, then roll it up tightly.

  • 5

    Slice the wrap in half diagonally and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chocolate and Banana Jar Cake
recipes.description: A refreshing salad featuring chickpeas, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, and feta cheese, tossed in a tangy lemon-herb dressing.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed

  • 1 cucumber, diced

  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

  • 1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced

  • 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese

  • 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

  • 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.

  • 2

    In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, chopped parsley, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.

  • 3

    Pour the dressing over the salad ingredient and toss gently to combine.

  • 4

    Adjust seasoning if necessary, then chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

  • 5

    Serve cold and enjoy!

recipes.name: Caramel Blueberry Scones
recipes.description: A vibrant pasta dish featuring al dente spaghetti tossed in homemade pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and fresh spinach leaves.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 8 ounces spaghetti

  • 1 cup fresh basil leaves

  • 1/4 cup pine nuts, toasted

  • 2 cloves garlic

  • 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese

  • 1/4 cup olive oil

  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

  • 2 cups fresh spinach leaves

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Cook spaghetti according to package instruction until al dente. Drain and set aside.

  • 2

    In a food processor, combine fresh basil leaves, toasted pine nuts, garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese. Pulse until finely chopped.

  • 3

    With the food processor running, slowly drizzle in olive oil until the pesto sauce is smooth.

  • 4

    In a large skillet, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add cherry tomatoes and cook until softened.

  • 5

    Add cooked spaghetti and pesto sauce to the skillet, tossing until the pasta is evenly coated.

  • 6

    Stir in fresh spinach leaves and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

  • 7

    Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Blueberry Carrot Cake
recipes.description: A delicious panini featuring grilled zucchini, bell peppers, red onions, and provolone cheese, served with a flavorful pesto spread.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 zucchini, sliced lengthwise

  • 1 red bell pepper, sliced

  • 1 red onion, sliced

  • 4 slices provolone cheese

  • 4 ciabatta rolls, split

  • 1/4 cup pesto sauce
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.

  • 2

    Brush zucchini, bell pepper, and red onion slices with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

  • 3

    Grill the vegetables until tender and lightly charred, about 3-4 minutes per side.

  • 4

    Spread pesto sauce on the bottom half of each ciabatta roll.

  • 5

    Layer grilled vegetables and provolone cheese on top of the pesto spread.

  • 6

    Close the sandwiches with the top half of the ciabatta rolls.

  • 7

    Grill the paninis until the cheese is melted and the bread is toasted, about 3-4 minutes per side.

  • 8

    Slice the paninis in half diagonally and serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegan Cauliflower Salad
recipes.description: A flavorful dish featuring chewy noodles tossed in a creamy peanut sauce, served with crispy tofu and assorted vegetables.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 8 ounces rice noodles

  • 1 block (14 ounces) firm tofu, pressed and cubed

  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, broccoli, etc.), sliced

  • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

  • 1/4 cup creamy peanut butter

  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce

  • 2 tablespoons rice vinegar

  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil

  • 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 1 teaspoon grated ginger

  • Crushed peanuts and chopped cilantro, for garnish
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Cook rice noodles according to package instruction until al dente. Drain and set aside.

  • 2

    In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add cubed tofu and cook until golden and crispy on all sides. Remove tofu from skillet and set aside.

  • 3

    In the same skillet, add more oil if needed. Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender-crisp.

  • 4

    In a small bowl, whisk together peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, honey or maple syrup, minced garlic, and grated ginger to make the sauce.

  • 5

    Add cooked noodles and crispy tofu to the skillet with the vegetables. Pour the peanut sauce over the noodles and tofu, tossing until everything is evenly coated.

  • 6

    Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until heated through.

  • 7

    Garnish with crushed peanuts and chopped cilantro before serving.

recipes.name: Roasted Red Pepper Soup
recipes.description: A wholesome bowl featuring tender chicken, nutty brown rice, hearty black beans, and vibrant toppings like avocado, salsa, and cilantro.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup brown rice, cooked

  • 1 cup cooked chicken breast, shredded

  • 1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed

  • 1/2 cup corn kernels, cooked

  • 1/2 avocado, sliced

  • 1/4 cup salsa

  • 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro

  • Lime wedges, for serving
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Divide cooked brown rice among serving bowls.

  • 2

    Top with shredded chicken, black beans, cooked corn kernels, sliced avocado, salsa, and chopped cilantro.

  • 3

    Squeeze fresh lime juice over the bowl before serving.

  • 4

    Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.name: Eggs and Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A classic Greek salad featuring crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, tangy feta cheese, briny olives, and a zesty vinaigrette.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 4 cups romaine lettuce, chopped

  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

  • 1 cucumber, sliced

  • 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced

  • 1/4 cup Kalamata olives

  • 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese

  • 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar

  • 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil

  • 1 teaspoon dried oregano

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, red onion, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese.

  • 2

    In a small bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the vinaigrette.

  • 3

    Drizzle the vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to coat.

  • 4

    Adjust seasoning if necessary, then serve immediately.

recipes.name: Pork Shoulder Cashew Noodles
recipes.description: Delicious skewers featuring succulent shrimp, colorful bell peppers, zucchini, and red onion, served over fluffy quinoa.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

  • 2 bell peppers (any color), cut into chunks

  • 1 zucchini, sliced

  • 1 red onion, cut into chunks

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika

  • 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • Cooked quinoa, for serving
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    If using wooden skewers, soak them in water for about 30 minutes to prevent burning.

  • 2

    Preheat grill to medium-high heat.

  • 3

    In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, minced garlic, smoked paprika, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the marinade.

  • 4

    Thread shrimp, bell peppers, zucchini, and red onion onto skewers, alternating as desired.

  • 5

    Brush skewers with the marinade, coating them evenly.

  • 6

    Grill skewers for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until shrimp are pink and vegetables are tender and slightly charred.

  • 7

    Serve shrimp and veggie skewers over cooked quinoa and enjoy!
recipes.nutrition:
Nutrition Facts

  • Calories

recipes.name: Toasted Farfalle In Pesto Sauce
recipes.description: Juicy chicken breasts stuffed with a flavorful mixture of spinach, feta cheese, garlic, and herbs, baked to perfection.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts

  • 2 cups fresh spinach, chopped

  • 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano

  • 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme

  • Salt and pepper, to taste
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).

  • 2

    In a mixing bowl, combine chopped spinach, crumbled feta cheese, minced garlic, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt, and pepper.

  • 3

    Make a horizontal slit along the side of each chicken breast to create a pocket. Be careful not to cut all the way through.

  • 4

    Stuff each chicken breast with the spinach and feta mixture.

  • 5

    Season the outside of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.

  • 6

    Place stuffed chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.

  • 7

    Remove from oven and let rest for a few minutes before serving.

  • 8

    Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Cheesy Bacon Burger Sliders
recipes.description: A comforting soup featuring nutritious lentils, hearty vegetables, and aromatic spices, perfect for chilly days.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup dried green lentils, rinsed and drained

  • 1 onion, diced

  • 2 carrots, diced

  • 2 stalks celery, diced

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 6 cups vegetable broth

  • 1 can (14 ounces) diced tomatoes

  • 1 teaspoon ground cumin

  • 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric

  • 1/2 teaspoon paprika

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • Chopped fresh parsley, for garnish
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced onion, carrots, and celery, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.

  • 2

    Stir in minced garlic, ground cumin, ground turmeric, and paprika, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.

  • 3

    Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes (with juices), salt, and pepper to the pot. Bring to a boil.

  • 4

    Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils and vegetables are tender.

  • 5

    Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary.

  • 6

    Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.

recipes.name: Fig and Raisins Oatmeal
recipes.description: Flaky salmon fillets glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with tender steamed broccoli and fluffy brown rice.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 4 salmon fillets

  • 1/2 cup teriyaki sauce

  • 4 cups broccoli florets

  • 2 cups cooked brown rice

  • 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, for garnish

  • Sliced green onions, for garnish
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).

  • 2

    Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Brush teriyaki sauce evenly over the fillets.

  • 3

    Bake salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.

  • 4

    While the salmon is baking, steam broccoli until tender, about 5-7 minutes.

  • 5

    Divide cooked brown rice among serving plates. Top with steamed broccoli and baked teriyaki salmon.

  • 6

    Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions before serving.

recipes.name: Silky Smooth Panna Cotta
recipes.description: Cheesy and flavorful quesadillas filled with sautéed vegetables, served with creamy guacamole for dipping.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 4 large flour tortillas

  • 2 cups shredded cheese (cheddar, Monterey Jack, or a blend)

  • 1 bell pepper, thinly sliced

  • 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced

  • 1 cup sliced mushrooms

  • 1 cup baby spinach leaves

  • 1 avocado, mashed

  • 1 tablespoon lime juice

  • 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • Sour cream and salsa, for serving
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a skillet, sauté sliced bell pepper, red onion, mushrooms, and baby spinach until tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

  • 2

    In another skillet, place a flour tortilla over medium heat. Sprinkle shredded cheese over half of the tortilla. Add a layer of the sautéed vegetables on top of the cheese.

  • 3

    Fold the tortilla over to cover the filling, creating a half-moon shape. Press down gently with a spatula.

  • 4

    Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy, and the cheese is melted.

  • 5

    Repeat with the remaining tortillas and filling ingredient.

  • 6

    In a small bowl, mix mashed avocado with lime juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to make guacamole.

  • 7

    Slice quesadillas into wedges and serve hot with guacamole, sour cream, and salsa.

recipes.name: Triple Decker Cranberry Cake
recipes.description: A satisfying sandwich featuring creamy egg salad made with hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, and fresh herbs, served on wholesome whole grain bread.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 6 hard-boiled eggs, chopped

  • 1/4 cup mayonnaise

  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

  • 2 tablespoons fresh chives, chopped

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 8 slices whole grain bread, toasted

  • Lettuce leaves, for serving

  • Sliced tomatoes, for serving
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a mixing bowl, combine chopped hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, chopped fresh chives, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.

  • 2

    Spread egg salad mixture evenly onto 4 slices of toasted whole grain bread.

  • 3

    Top with lettuce leaves, sliced tomatoes, and remaining slices of toasted bread.

  • 4

    Slice sandwiches in half and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Very Berry Healthy Summer Smoothie
recipes.description: A fragrant and hearty Moroccan stew made with chickpeas, tomatoes, carrots, and a blend of spices, served over fluffy couscous.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

  • 1 onion, chopped

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 2 carrots, sliced

  • 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed

  • 1 can (14 ounces) diced tomatoes

  • 1 cup vegetable broth

  • 2 teaspoons ground cumin

  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

  • 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger

  • 1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 1 cup couscous, cooked

  • Chopped fresh cilantro, for garnish
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large skillet or tagine, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, and sauté until softened.

  • 2

    Stir in sliced carrots, drained and rinsed chickpeas, diced tomatoes (with juices), vegetable broth, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground turmeric, salt, and pepper.

  • 3

    Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and let it cook for 20-25 minutes, or until carrots are tender.

  • 4

    Fluff cooked couscous with a fork and divide among serving bowls.

  • 5

    Spoon Moroccan chickpea tagine over the couscous.

  • 6

    Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro before serving.

recipes.name: Crispy Orange Chips
recipes.description: Light and refreshing lettuce wraps filled with a delicious tuna salad made with canned tuna, crunchy vegetables, and tangy dressing.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 2 cans (5 ounces each) tuna in water, drained

  • 1/4 cup mayonnaise

  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

  • 1/4 cup diced celery

  • 1/4 cup diced red onion

  • 1/4 cup diced dill pickles

  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 8 large lettuce leaves
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a mixing bowl, combine drained tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, diced celery, diced red onion, diced dill pickles, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.

  • 2

    Spoon tuna salad mixture onto the center of each lettuce leaf.

  • 3

    Wrap the lettuce leaves around the tuna salad, folding the sides in first and then rolling from the bottom up.

  • 4

    Secure the wraps with toothpicks if needed.

  • 5

    Serve immediately, and enjoy!

recipes.name: Turmeric Lavender Tea
recipes.description: Vibrant and flavorful tacos filled with roasted sweet potatoes, seasoned black beans, and topped with creamy avocado salsa.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

  • 1 can (15 ounces) black beans, drained and rinsed

  • 1 teaspoon chili powder

  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 8 small corn or flour tortillas, warmed

  • 1 ripe avocado, diced

  • 1/4 cup diced red onion

  • 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro

  • Juice of 1 lime
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).

  • 2

    Toss diced sweet potatoes with olive oil, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet. Spread in an even layer.

  • 3

    Roast sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.

  • 4

    In a small saucepan, heat black beans over medium heat. Stir in chili powder, ground cumin, salt, and pepper. Cook until heated through.

  • 5

    In a mixing bowl, combine diced avocado, diced red onion, chopped fresh cilantro, and lime juice to make avocado salsa.

  • 6

    To assemble tacos, spoon roasted sweet potatoes and seasoned black beans onto warmed tortillas. Top with avocado salsa.

  • 7

    Serve immediately, and enjoy!
recipes.nutrition:
Nutrition Facts

  • Calories

    280

  • Total Fat

    10g

  • Saturated Fat

    1.5g

  • Cholesterol

    0mg

  • Sodium

    300mg

  • Total Carbohydrate

    40g

  • Dietary Fiber

    10g

  • Total Sugars

    3g

  • Protein

    8g

recipes.name: Blue Velvet Brownies
recipes.description: A fragrant and hearty Moroccan stew made with chickpeas, tomatoes, carrots, and a blend of spices, served over fluffy couscous.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

  • 1 onion, chopped

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

  • 2 carrots, sliced

  • 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed

  • 1 can (14 ounces) diced tomatoes

  • 1 cup vegetable broth

  • 2 teaspoons ground cumin

  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

  • 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger

  • 1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 1 cup couscous, cooked

  • Chopped fresh cilantro, for garnish
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a large skillet or tagine, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, and sauté until softened.

  • 2

    Stir in sliced carrots, drained and rinsed chickpeas, diced tomatoes (with juices), vegetable broth, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground turmeric, salt, and pepper.

  • 3

    Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and let it cook for 20-25 minutes, or until carrots are tender.

  • 4

    Fluff cooked couscous with a fork and divide among serving bowls.

  • 5

    Spoon Moroccan chickpea tagine over the couscous.

  • 6

    Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro before serving.
recipes.nutrition:

  • Total Fat

recipes.name: Birthday Cupcakes
recipes.description: Light and refreshing lettuce wraps filled with a delicious tuna salad made with canned tuna, crunchy vegetables, and tangy dressing.
recipes.ingredient:
Ingredients

  • 2 cans (5 ounces each) tuna in water, drained

  • 1/4 cup mayonnaise

  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

  • 1/4 cup diced celery

  • 1/4 cup diced red onion

  • 1/4 cup diced dill pickles

  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice

  • Salt and pepper, to taste

  • 8 large lettuce leaves
recipes.instruction:
Instructions
  • 1

    In a mixing bowl, combine drained tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, diced celery, diced red onion, diced dill pickles, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.

  • 2

    Spoon tuna salad mixture onto the center of each lettuce leaf.

  • 3

    Wrap the lettuce leaves around the tuna salad, folding the sides in first and then rolling from the bottom up.

  • 4

    Secure the wraps with toothpicks if needed.

  • 5

    Serve immediately, and enjoy!
